HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Ritual)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Ritual are said to be blessed by Mara. They are naturally more resilient against diseases and infections, and boast an increased healing ability. The light of Mara also radiates from within them, making it easier for them to sway others to their side.

<color=#E5E54C>Blessed Word</color>
Conversion power is increased by 15%.

<color=#E5E54C>Mara's Gift</color>
Immunity gain speed is increased by 15%.
Injury healing factor is increased by 15%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Ritual are said to be blessed by Mara. They are naturally more resilient against diseases and infections, and boast an increased healing ability. The light of Mara also radiates from within them, making it easier for them to sway others to their side.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lover)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Lover are both nimble and accurate, and often leave a lasting impression on those they interact with.

<color=#E5E54C>Mooncalf</color>
Melee hit chance is increased by 2.5 points.
Melee dodge chance is increased by 2.5 points.
Shooting accuracy is increased by 2.5 points.

<color=#E5E54C>Lover's Kiss</color>
Social impact is increased by 15%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Lover are both nimble and accurate, and often leave a lasting impression on those they interact with.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lord)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Lord naturally heal wounds at a much faster rate, but are highly susceptible to flame.

<color=#E5E54C>Blood of the North</color>
Injury healing factor is increased by 50%.

<color=#E5E54C>Trollkin</color>
Flammability is increased by 100%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Lord are able to quickly restore health, but are highly susceptible to flame.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Mage)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Mage are adept at utilising psycasts, though they are often easily distracted, and tend to be somewhat arrogant.

<color=#E5E54C>Fay</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 50% of the pawns Intellectual skill.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Mage are adept at utilising psycasts, though they are often easily distracted, and tend to be somewhat arrogant.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Shadow)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Shadow are highly adept at blending into their surroundings, especially in poorly lit environments.

<color=#E5E54C>Moonshadow</color>
Shooting accuracy is increased by 15% in dark environments.
Melee dodge chance is increased by 15% in dark environments.
Melee hit chance is increased by 15% in dark environments.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Shadow are highly adept at blending into their surroundings, especially in poorly lit environments.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Steed)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Steed are masters of moving from one place to the other, though they tend to become restless easily.

<color=#E5E54C>Charioteer</color>
Move speed is increased by 1.5 tiles per second.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Steed are masters of moving from one place to the other, though they tend to become restless easily.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Apprentice)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Apprentice are highly skilled at utilising psycasts. Though this is usually a double-edged sword, as they often have an increased sensitivity to psychic energy.

<color=#E5E54C>Elfborn</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 150% of the pawns Intellectual skill.
Psychic sensitivity is increased by 50%, this bonus does not increase maximum neural heat.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Apprentice are highly skilled at utilising psycasts. Though this is usually a double-edged sword, as they often have an increased sensitivity to psychic energy.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Warrior)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Warrior are naturally gifted with melee weapons, and are able to hit even the most nimble of targets.

<color=#E5E54C>Warwyrd</color>
Melee hit chance is increased by 10 points.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Warrior are naturally gifted with melee weapons, and are able to hit even the most nimble of targets.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lady)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Lady are said to be some of the most caring and tolerant. They can solve many situations with words alone, and are tireless in their quest to help others.

<color=#E5E54C>Lady's Favor</color>
Negotiation ability is increased by 15%.
Trade prices are improved by 15%.
Social impact is increased by 15%.

<color=#E5E54C>Lady's Grace</color>
Fatigue gain is decreased by 15%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Lady are said to be some of the most caring and tolerant. They can solve many situations with words alone, and are tireless in their quest to help others.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Tower)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Tower are both resilient to anything that would dare attempt to topple them, and adept at entering places they are not meant to.

<color=#E5E54C>Tower Key</color>
Hacking speed is increased by 25%.

<color=#E5E54C>Tower Warden</color>
All incoming damage is reduced by 15%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Tower are both resilient to anything that would dare attempt to topple them, and adept at entering places they are not meant to.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Atronach)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Atronach are among the most dangerous of psycasters, though they are unable to dissipate neural heat on their own.

<color=#E5E54C>Wormburn</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 200% of the pawns Intellectual skill.
Reduces neural heat by 50% of damage taken.
Completely unable to dissipate neural heat over time.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Atronach are among the most dangerous of psycasters, though they are unable to dissipate neural heat on their own.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Thief)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Thief are prone to taking risks, though seem to never fall victim to the dangers those risks impose. Many believe these individuals to be cursed, that their luck will eventually fail at the worst time.

<color=#E5E54C>Akaviri Danger Sense</color>
Melee dodge chance is increased by 10 points.
Trap spring chance is decreased by 10%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the sign of The Thief are prone to taking risks, though seem to never fall victim to the dangers those risks impose. Many believe these individuals to be cursed, that their luck will eventually fail at the worst time.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Serpent)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the wandering sign of The Serpent seemingly have nothing in common. Some believe they are blessed, others that they are cursed.

<color=#E5E54C>Star Curse</color>
Toxic resistance is increased by 30%.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Those born under the wandering sign of The Serpent seemingly have nothing in common. Some believe they are blessed, others that they are cursed.
